about.details:
Incorporated in February 2013, Thinking Hats Entertainment Solutions Limited specializes in concept development, event design, and production for live events, corporate functions, MICE, social and virtual events, as well as OTT content production and experiential marketing with a focus on content development, intellectual property curation, and tech-centric product development.

The company makes exclusive content for OTT platforms such as Netflix, Amazon, Sony Liv, MX Player, Disney+Hotstar, Voot, Zee5, etc.

The company has produced two web series for OTT platforms: "Aapkey Kamrey Me Koi Rehta Hai" and "Kathmandu Connection 2", as well as one Bengali movie titled "Onek Diner Pore". In addition to movies and OTT web series, we also create short films for YouTube content and corporate event movies.

The company's clients include Tata Group, including Westside and Zudio, Goldman Sachs, McDonalds, and Uber, as well as media brands like The Times of India, HT Media, Network 18 Media & Investments, Radio Mirchi, and Fever Entertainment.

Competitive Strength

  • Talented team with a successful track record in event management, retail visual merchandising, and high-quality digital content creation.
  • They have established connections with their clients and key figures in the entertainment industry, such as writers, directors, and streaming platforms.
  • Strong brand recognition and a reputation for excellence in successful event management and retail visual merchandising.

As of September 2024, the Company had 35 employees on payroll.

faqs.question: What is the Thinking Hats Entertainment Solutions IPO?
faqs.answer:
Thinking Hats Entertainment Solutions IPO is a SME IPO of 3429000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹15.09 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹44 per share. The minimum order quantity is 3000.

The IPO opens on September 25, 2024, and closes on September 27, 2024.

Mas Services Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Thinking Hats Entertainment Solutions IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Thinking Hats Entertainment Solutions IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Thinking Hats Entertainment Solutions IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Thinking Hats Entertainment Solutions IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Thinking Hats Entertainment Solutions IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Thinking Hats Entertainment Solutions IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Thinking Hats Entertainment Solutions IPO opens on September 25, 2024 and closes on September 27, 2024.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Thinking Hats Entertainment Solutions IPO?
faqs.answer: Thinking Hats Entertainment Solutions IPO lot size is 3000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,32,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Thinking Hats Entertainment Solutions IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Thinking Hats Entertainment Solutions IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Thinking Hats Entertainment Solutions IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Thinking Hats Entertainment Solutions IPO will be done on Monday, September 30, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, October 1, 2024. Check the Thinking Hats Entertainment Solutions IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Thinking Hats Entertainment Solutions IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Thinking Hats Entertainment Solutions IPO listing date is on Thursday, October 3, 2024.
